structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations

law.catch_line: Security For Payment Of Alimony Or Support; Enforcement Of Judgments Or Orders
law.text: When alimony or support is adjudged for the spouse or children, the court may require sufficient security for its payment according to the judgment. Each judgment or order of support which is issued, reviewed or modified pursuant to this chapter shall conform to and shall be enforced in accordance with the provisions of section twelve of chapter one hundred and nineteen A.
